title: Why does the ADC  still take Heal instead of the support?
body: Since heal heals your target and yourself for the same amount now that it's not an aoe why does the adc take heal instead of the support?  The adc could take ignite or exhaust.  Especially a short range ADC.  It would give them extra dueling potential and/or self peel when they are farming a lane while the support is off with the rest of the team later on in the game as well.
